inn1.comm: short of a good length and outside the off, a bit of away movement, left alone to the keeper
And once again just outside the off and a hitn of away movement, left alone to the keeper
short of a driving length and skiddy off the pitch, played at and missed, through to the keeper
good-length ball on the stumps, clipped away to square-leg. That could have been put away. Rohit Sharma fields
short of a driving length and on the stumps, defended back down the pitch with a straight bat
short of a length and outside the off, a hint of swing away from the left-hand bat, left alone to the keeper and Praveen Kumar begins his ODI career with a maiden over
full and on the stumps, no swing first up, that one is dead straight. Imran Nazir watches carefully and defends back down the pitch
fuller and outside the off stump, played at and missed, through to the keeper. That moved away a bit and could easily have taken an edge.
short of a good length and on the stumps, driven inside out through the off side. Nazir standing tall on that occasion and driving with the full face of the bat
short of a length, down the leg side, big expansive pull played and missed, through to the keeper
pacy and outside the off, a hint of away movement after pitching and the ball beats the flashing blade of Imran Nazir
fuller and a touch too straight, slipping down the leg side, flick played at and missed, rapped on the pad. The ball bobs away down to the leg side
full once more and just outside the off, this one shapes away a touch as well, defended away towards the off side. Nazir covering for the swing on this occasion
Bang! that's too short and Imran Nazir lines it up early. It's right in the hitting zone and he unfurls an excellent pull shot to the midwicket fence. First really convincing stroke of the innings
full and on the pads this time, just a bit too straight. Butt walks across and works the ball to leg
full and on the off, just a hint of movement into the left-handed Butt this time, defended towards mid-off with a straight bat
quite full once more and on teh stumps, defended back towards the off side
quite full once more and on teh stumps, defended back towards the off side. Praveen Kumar making a really impressive start here.
short of a length and a bit too far outside the off stump, left well alone to the keeper
fuller and on the stumps, once again there's just a hint of swing and this keeps the batsman honest. Butt defends back down the pitch
pushed through fuller and slanted away from the left-handed Butt. The batsman hangs his bat out limply outside the off and the ball passes safely through to the keeper
fullish and a touch too straight, slipping down leg, clipped off the toes to the on side for a single to get this Sreesanth over under way
short of a length and far outside the off, that is a loose ball, Butt goes back and across with minimal foot movement and climbs into a square-cut, crashing the ball to the point fence
fuller this time and on the stumps, Sreesanth overcompensating, clipped to the on side quite watchfully
Pace! That was a quick one from Sreesanth and really hurries the batsman who sort of loses sight of the ball as he plays a flashy drive. The ball beats bat and thuds into Dhoni's gloves
short of a good length and outside the off, this time just a careful defensive shot from the batsman

fuller and pushed through just wide of the off stump, this one does not swing at all. Butt drives with an angled bat and the ball goes uppishly towards point. Yuvraj fields as the ball falls well short of him
Now Imran Nazir faces Praveen Kumar. Fullish ball outside the off, a hint of swing, left alone to the keeper
fuller and on the off stump, this one comes in quite sharply in the air, Nazir plays it inside out towards cover
short of a driving length and on the stumps, defended back down the pitch ever so watchfully
full and on the stumps, defended back down the pitch to the bowler. Most impressive from Praveen Kumar so far as the batsmen play him carefully
short of a good length and on the pads, played off the hips for a single
fullish and on the off, change of angle as Praveen comes round the stumps, Butt watches the ball carefully onto bat and defends back down the pitch

full and straight, this one is just too full from Sreesanth, Butt watches the ball carefully and plays late, using his wrists well to keep the ball down as he drives back down the ground. That is a pretty shot
short of a good length and outside the off, slanted away from the left-handed batsman, easily left alone to the keeper
short ball banged in. There's the bouncer for variation. Butt ducks well under ball and lets it go through to the keeper.
short of a good length and outside the off, defended away with an angled bat. Good pace from Sreesanth here.
short, wide, angled further away. Sreesanth getting a bit too carried away here with the bounce this pitch is affording. Left well alone and called a wide.
overpitched and on the off stump, driven well but straight to the fielder at mid-off
short of a good length and on the stumps - decent line and length here - defended back down the pitch
short of a good length and on the stumps, played away towards a fielder with soft hands, Uthappa swoops in and throws at the stumps, there's no-one backing up and the overthrow is given away
short of a good length and on the off, just a bit of extra bounce, the ball hits the bat high up and bounces away towards third-man
pushed through just a bit wide outside the off stump, that keeps a bit low as well, played at and missed, through to the keeper
down the pitch and a big swing, Nazir goes for the big hit but is wild and misses, the ball goes just past the off stump to the keeper
Pathan comes into the attack and starts with a full-toss on the off stump, punched to the leg side but straight to mid-on
overpitched and on the pads, Pathan bowling very full looking for swing, Butt picks up the length early and flicks superbly through midwicket
just short of a good length and on the off, Butt defends to the off side with soft hands and the batsmen pinch a single
short of a good length and pitching outside leg, the batsman flicks and misses, rapped on the pad and there's a futile appeal for the lbw
fuller and on the off stump this time, just a hint of inswing, defended to the leg side with an angled bat
fuller and on the stumps, once again the batsman is happy to just defend back down the pitch with a straight bat
the batsman tries to work this to the on side, off the leading edge towards cover
short of a good length and outside the off stump, left well alone to the keeper
short of a length and on the off stump, defended back down the pitch with a straight bat. Praveen Kumar having tremendous success with his control so far
short of a length and too far wide outside the off stump - we were just talking about his accuracy - slapped away in front of point. That races to the boundary
short of a good length and on the off, delivered with a round-arm action, comes in with the angle, defended away towards cover
just short of a length and on the stumps, clipped to the on side for a single to end the over
short of a good length and outside the of stump, defended away towards the off side
short of a length and on the off stump, no swing for Pathan here, defended towards cover-point with an angled bat. How long can Nazir bat in such restrained fashion?
full and on the stumps, this one just comes in a touch. Defended. Off a thick inside edge towards the on side
short of a driving length and on the off stump, defended towards cover with an angled bat
short of a length and outside the off stump, Butt punches well but can't beat the fielder at cover

Crack! too full and wide of the stumps, Butt leans into this ball and cracks a cover-drive. The fielder at mid-off runs to his right and dives but can't get a hand to it as the ball speeds away across the turf!

Short and wide, Praveen Kumar's line and length are falling away a bit now. Nazir stands tall over this one and cracks a square-cut. He's well on top of the ball and the timing and placement are perfect
just short of a good length and on the off, defended back down the pitch. Good comeback from the bowler.
Another one! Short, wide and Praveen Kumar is losing the plot here. At his pace this is easy pickings. Imran Nazir doesn't even bother trying to keep the ball down and hits over point!
Overcompensating his time. Praveen Kumar full and on the pads, flick played and missed, off the thigh-pad and it's four more runs to Pakistan
slower ball outside the off stump, Nazir feels for this and misses, past the outside edge to the keeper
short of a length and outside the off, cut hard but doesn't beat the infield
fullish and on the stumps, nothing flashy from the batsman, just a defensive shot back down the pitch to the bowler
fuller and a touch wider outside the off, driven hard at, off a thick outside edge down to third-man
full and on the pads, a hint of swing there, clipped away off the pads down to fine-leg for an easy run
too full, too far outside the off, Salman Butt loves it there. Butt shuffles forward and uses his wrists to coax the ball through cover for a delectable boundary. Beautiful shot that
short of a good length and outside the off, left well alone to the keeper

short of a driving length and on the stumps, that's not swinging much and is a bit quicker. It skids through after pitching and hits Butt on the pads. There's a loud shout for the lbw but Suresh Shastri, the umpire is not interested. The batsmen go through for a leg bye.
short of a good length and on the stumps, defended back down the pitch. Decent start from Sreesanth in his return spell.
quick ball but this one is down the leg side and Sreesanth won't get away with it. Wide called as the batsman flicks half-heartedly and misses.
very full and on the off stump, defended back down the stumps with ease. Sreesanth fields and threatens to have a shy at the stumps but resists
fuller and outside the off, this one keeps a bit low, flashed at and missed, through to the keeper
just short of a length and on the off stump, Salman Butt is in two minds over whether to play forward or back and in the end settles for defending to off
slightly full and outside the off, driven uppishly but safely to cover

Gone! short one banged in, that's pitched halfway down the track and climbs quite high. Salman Butt should have left that alone but he goes for an ambitious pull shot. The ball spears off the top edge and goes straight up in the air. There's a fielder coming under it - Rohit Sharma at mid-on. He settles under the catch and the first Pakistani wicket has fallen.
short of a good length and outside the off stump, the batsman opens the face of the bat and runs the ball down to third-man for a single
short of a length and outside the off, punched back down the pitch to the bowler. Not in control of the shot but safely away from the bowler.
fullish and on the stumps, hint of swing in, defended back down towards the off side
very full and on the stumps, played away to the on side
short of a driving length and on the pads, flick played and missed, off the thigh pad to the leg side
down the leg side and full, played and missed, off the pads for four leg byes to end the over
beaten It was a length delivery outside off stump and Yasir has a flash and a miss.
closer to the off stump and Yasir pushes it out to the off side
leans across to a delivery outside off stump and defends to the off side.
Sreesanth strikes again! It landed on a length, just outside off, bounced, and shaped away a touch, Yasir was beaten by the extra bounce and the straightening as he pushed at it. Fatal attraction.
welcomes Yousuf with a bouncer, ducked under. Sreesanth has taken two wickets in his second spell.
leans forward across to defend a length delivery to the off side
on the spot, curves in off a length, on the middle stump line, wristed to square leg
fab square cut. Short in length, outside off stump and Yousuf cuts it to deep point
fuller, shaping in late, on the middle and leg, Yousuf falls over a touch as he tries to work it to the on side and is struck on the pad
takes this one away, with the angle, steered to third man

appeal for lbw but struck outside off stump. It landed on a length, outside off and moved in a touch, Imran lunged across, front leg way across, bat couldn't come around the pad in time and was struck. But outside the line.
short of a good length and outside the off, hint of away swing, flashed at and missed, through to the keeper
overpitched and on the pads, worked away down towards fine-leg with a deft flick of the wrists
short of a length and on the stumps, this one doesn't quite bounce as much as expected, flick played and missed. Off the pads to the leg side
full and on the off stump, quite quick, defended back down the pitch

Gone! slower ball on the off stump, Imran Nazir gives that an almighty thump. The batsman makes good contact but the ball comes straight back at Sreesanth who takes a good reflex catch in his followthrough. That's a good wicket and takes Sreesanth's tally to 50 scalps in ODI cricket
full and on the pads, not the best ball to follow-up a wicket, easily worked away through midwicket to get off the mark
short of a driving length, pitching outside leg, on the pads, worked away off the hips down towards fine-leg
short of a length and on the pads, a bit of bounce, defended back down the pitch to the leg side
short and a bit of width, Shoaib Malik stands tall and cuts well, down towards point, Yuvraj Singh does well to dive and stop that one
very full and on the pads, flicked away off the pads, a bit uppish but it's nowhere near a fielder and runs safely down towards fine-leg
fuller and outside the off stump, punched with an angled bat to point
just short of a good length, on the off stump, a hint of swing in to the right-handed batsman, defended back down the pitch with a straight bat
pushed to cover
just short of a good length and outside the off, Yousuf opens the face of the bat and runs the ball down to third-man

just short of a good length and outside the off, beautiful line and length here, a bit of extra bounce and outswing, played at and edged, the ball falls short of Sehwag at second slip. Good ball that.
dug in just a touch shorter, delivered from wide of the crease, slanting in to the batsman who stands on tip-toe and defends with soft hands
fuller and outside the off, this one goes through straight, left well alone to the keeper
shorter, pretty straight, plenty of pace and extra bounce, the batsman was really hurried as he plays a cut shot. That ball wasn't wide enough for the cut anyway. Past the outside edge to the keeper
tossed up and outside the off, heaved across the line through midwicket. Not in total control but the ball races away to the midwicket fence anyway
well flighted and outside the off, driven inside out and through cover for a single
very full and on the stumps, driven down the pitch to long-off for another single
arm ball on the stumps, defended back down the pitch with care
fuller and on the pads, flick played and missed, off the pads to the leg side
flat and on the pads, sweep played and missed, rapped on the pad, another stifled shout for the lbw
short of a driving length and on the off stump, very straight and quite pacy as well, defended back down the pitch with a straight bat
short of a length and outside the off, punched just wide of cover off the back foot, the single is pinched

full and straight, punched back down the ground by Yousuf, Sreesanth fields and makes like he's going to throw the stumps down at the batsman's end. Yousuf can only laugh in bemusement at Sreesanth's antics
just short of a good length and on the stumps, Yousuf goes across his stumps and flicks the ball delicately through midwicket. Pleasing on the eye that shot
short of a good length and outside the off stump, left alone to the keeper
short and wide, that's a bad way to end a good over. Shoaib Malik cashes in, standing tall and smacking the ball through point. Powerful square-cut and the placement is excellent.
fullish and on the stumps, quite slow too, a bit of turn, defended back down the pitch
loopy ball on the stumps, once again the batsman just defends very carefully back down the pitch
flatter this time and just slipping down leg, deflected towards square-leg for a single and the hundred comes up for Pakistan
full and on the stumps, defended
short of a driving length and outside the off, a bit slower, a bit more purchase off the surface, eased to cover
short of a good length and on midlle and leg, worked away to the on side
short of a length and on the off stump, worked to the leg side
fullish and on the stumps, worked to the leg side
again flat and on the pads, knocked away towards square-leg
short of a length and outside the off, punched off the back foot to short cover. There's a shy at the stumps that misses and the overthrow is given
short and a bit of width, cut down to short third-man
fuller and on the pads, defended with soft hands
tossed up a bit extra and on the middle and leg, flick played and missed,  rapped on the pad
fullish and on the off this time, a little flatter, defended
short of a good length and outside the off, eased just wide of the diving cover fielder
flatter and on the stumps, played back down the pitch to the bowler
Take that! tossed up a touch more and on the stumps, Yousuf comes down the pitch and effortlessly lifts that over midwicket. That's a clinically effective shot
pushed towards cover
fullish and on the off, played back down the pitch to the bowler
short of a length and on the pads, Malik comes down the pitch and works the ball to long-on
flat, full, quicker, defended back down the pitch
fuller and on the pads, worked down to short fine-leg for a single, good use of the feet
just short of a length and outside the off, steered down to short third-man this time
short of a length and on the stumps, eased through cover off the back foot
fullish and on the pads, eased through the on side for a single
fullish and on the stumps, defended to the leg side
fullish and outside the off, eased through cover
flatter and on the stumps, knocked away to the on side, but won't beat the infield
slower and on the stumps, the batsman takes no chance, just easing the ball down to long-off for a single
full and a touch too straight, slipping down leg, worked off the pads towards square-leg
another ball on the pads and again worked to the on side for a single
action replay of the last ball.
tossed up and outside the off stump, eased down to long-off
fired in quick and flat, well down the leg side, wide called
short of a good length and on the stumps, eased down to long-on for a single
short of a length and outside the off, cut down to short third-man
well flighted and on the stumps, defended back to the off side, Kartik fields
driven inside out, with the turn, through cover
tight and on the stumps, defended
fullish and outside the off, pushed wide of extra-cover for a single. No big shots for a while now but the singles coming regularly.
held back a touch, on the stumps, eased to long-on. Single brings up the 50 of the partnership
fuller and on the stumps, stroked wide of midwicket for a couple to end the over
down the leg side, Yuvraj begins with a wide
and another wide, not a great start from Yuvraj, well down leg side
full and on the pads, defended to midwicket
short of a good length and on the pads, defended to leg
again short and flat, worked towards mid-on
full and on the off, defended watchfully
eased down to long-on back past a diving Yuvraj
down the pitch and lofted over the infield towards midwicket
eased down to long on, all the runs coming in ones and twos at the moment
fuller and outside the off, defended wide of point for a single
played down past the bowler to long-on for yet another single
down the leg side, a bit quicker and flatter, eased wide of midwicket
down the pitch, lofted inside out and over cover. The fielder there, it's Yuvraj, gets one hand to it jumping up but can't hold onto it
short of a length and outside the off, crashed off the back foot through cover for a much-needed boundary
swept just wide of the fielder at short fine-leg
another one down the leg side, worked past Tendulkar at short fine-leg
flatter and on the pads, played and missed, rapped on the pad, appeal for the lbw, turned down
again played down towards short fine-leg
Yousuf comes down the pitch with an aim of hitting inside out and over cover. Yuvraj adjusts his length and Yousuf is forced to defend.
short of a length and on the pads, worked to the on side
fullish and on the stumps, swept down towards square-leg
Down the pitch and heaved over midwicket. Struck sweetly and this disappears over midwicket for maximum!
eased inside out through cover
very full and on the pads, the batsman jams the ball out to the leg side
down the pitch and worked through the on side
full and on the pads, swept to deep backward square-leg
and here's another one smeared through the leg side for a single
nurdled through square leg, the runs are coming easily now
quicker ball fired in, it's very far down the leg side and beats batsman and keeper
fuller and on the stumps, much better ball, defended back down the pitch
and another wide from Yuvraj, down the leg, left alone easily
short of a length and outside the off, played wide of the man at cover
floated in slower and on the legs, flick played and missed, off the pads to the on side
full and down the leg side, not a good start that, wide down the leg side
fullish and outside the off, driven inside out and on the rise towards cover. Uthappa dives and fields well.
short of a length and outside the off, left well alone to the keeper
another one that's down the leg side, deflected away through square-leg for a couple more
full and on the off stump, punched hard but straight to cover
full and outside the off, driven just wide of cover for a single that brings up Malik's half-century
fullish and on the off, thick inside edge down towards fine-leg for a couple of more runs
short of a good length and outside the off, played down towards third-man with an angled bat
on target to start off with, around the off stump, on a length, Yousuf dabs it to third man for a single
delivered from the classical side-on action, on the middle stump, tickled to on side for a single
leans across to a length delivery around off stump and taps it into cover point

so near yet so far for Praveen. He would have thought he had his first ODI wicket. He had banged it in short, outside off stump, Malik top-edged a pull shot high in the air but it landed safely way behind the 'keeper
slower one, around 116 k, full and on the off stump, dabbed away to point
full, well outside off stump and Yousuf goes down on his knee to crash it to deep point
short and climbing outside off stump, Malik hopped up and cut it to right of sweeper cover
slower one, off cutter, on the middle and leg, tucked behind square leg for a single
fullish, outside off stump, square driven to deep point
from round the wickets, around the off stump, Malik went back, steered it through backward point, wide of third man and rushed across to pick two runs
fullish, just outside off stump, driven to cover
flighted full, on the middle stump line, driven to long-on
came down the track and Kartik fired it full, Malik drove it inside-out to wide long-off
again full, Malik is down the track to drive to long-on
slows up the pace, around off stump, not much turn, Yousuf waits before driving to sweeper cover. That;s his 50
Malik celebrates Yousuf's fifty with a six over long-on. He charged down the track and heaved it over the boundary
just outside off stump, chopped to short third man
full and on the pads, stroked down to long-on for an effortless and risk-free single
quicker one fired in but well down the leg side, helped along round the corner for a boundary past short fine-leg
fuller and on the stumps, driven down to long-off
slower and on the stumps, the batsman defends carefully
heaved over the leg side, the ball goes high in the air but lands well safe of two fielders in the deep
flat and on the pads, worked to the on side
full and down the leg side, swept very hard, Gambhir dives on the ropes and fields well. That was powerfully struck
down the pitch comes the batsman, Kartik sees Malik coming and adjusts his length. The batsman is forced to defend
eased down to long-on for a single
short of a good length and on the stumps, a single is carved through cover
down the pitch once more, taken on the full and driven hard to wide midwicket. Uthappa dives but fails to field that one on the ropes
slower and on the pads, defensive shot played and missed, struck on the pad
fullish and outside the off, flashing shot from Yousuf, the ball goes just past the outside edge to the keeper
short of a good length and outside the off, Yousuf walks into the line of the ball and drives fluently. He's particularly good square of the wicket. Cracking shot that!
short of a length and outside the off, played down to third-man with a last-minute opening of the face of the bat
just short of a length and outside the off, this one doesn't bounce much at all and beats the stroke and skids through to the keeper
short one banged in, Shoaib Malik plays a pull but is late on the shot and the ball goes up in the air off the leading edge but falls short of the fielder at third-man
slower ball, very full and far outside the off stump, swatted just wide of the point fielder
fullish and outside the off, stroked through cover for an effortless single
short one banged in, Yuvraj expected the batsman to come down the pitch, instead Malik goes back and pulls powerfully over midwicket.
full and straight, driven inside out through cover
flighted, full, outside the off, driven awkwardly to the on side
yorker speared in on the stumps, somehow it's dug out
inside out and over cover once more. This time won't go all the way but a couple of runs anyhow
overpitched and outside the off, Sreesanth begins his last over badly, driven inside out through cover with serious power. The runs are beginning to flow now
full and quite straight, worked to the on side for a single
full again and on the off stump, driven wide of the fielder at mid-off for yet another single
slower ball, well directed, but Yousuf picks it and flicks wristily through square-leg
short of a length and on the off, a bit of extra bounce, Malik stands tall and just pushes the ball back past the bowler
full, straight, quite quick, worked away to the leg side to end the over
down the leg side, sweep played and missed, wide called
short of a length and outside the off, squeezed past point

Gone! again Shoaib Malik jumps down the pitch, this time Kartik sees the batsman coming and spears the ball in wide of the stumps and a touch quicker. Mahendra Singh Dhoni collects and breaks the stumps and Malik is stumped by some distance. That's a wicket India desperately needed, but Malik has played a strong hand as it is.
fullish and on the stumps, defended away for a quick single
on the middle and leg, sweep played down to the on side for a single
floated in full and on the off stump, driven back down the pitch to long-off for a single
flat and on the stumps, defended watchfully back down the pitch
fullish and on the off, eased just wide of short third-man for a single to start the over
short of a good length and outside the off, played away for a single
Misbah sees this one early and goes for the big hit. He plants his foot down the pitch and launches the ball into the stands over midwicket. Big one!
Reverse sweep this time. Misbah foesn't quite get hold of it but manages to hit it well enoguh to clear short third-man
full-toss on the pads, driven to deep midwicket

Gone! floater outsisde the off stump, a bit slower and it grips the surface and turns, Yousuf has stretched down the pitch and overbalanced. He misses and is smartly stumped by Dhoni. Now India in with a good chance as both set batsmen have been dismissed.
fullish and on the stumps, good line and length, defended carefully
flatter and on the pads, deflected to short fine-leg
well down the leg side, left alone, a bit of turn as the ball goes through to the keeper
flatter, quicker, on the off stump, defended
fullish and on the off stump, defended back down the pitch to the bowler
eased just wide of the bowler to long-on
again full and on the pads, a single is pinched down to fine-leg
eased down to long-off for a single
short of a good length and on the stumps, played at and missed, rapped on the pad, appeal for the lbw, turned down as the ball is slipping well down leg
overpitched and on the leg stump, eased down to long-on for a single
slower ball just outside the off stump, chipped past point for a single. Tight over so far from Praveen Kumar
fullish and outside the off, driven at, it's uppish but falls short of Yuvraj at point
a touch too full and on the stumps, driven back down the pitch. Praveen Kumar gets a hand to it and slows the ball down as it heads towards long-off. Tidy over from India's perspective
short one banged in outside the off stump, this time the batsman comes down the pitch and slaps the ball over the leg side. Not pretty but quite effective
slower ball on the off stump, defended down carefully to the off side and a quick single is pinched
just short of a good length and on the stumps, defended awkwardly, the ball goes off a thick inside edge to the leg side
fullish and outside the off, massive heave from Fawad Alam, thick inside edge back onto the pad
full and on the stumps, Pathan striving for the yorker, driven back down the pitch back past the bowler to long-on
slower ball on the stumps, all the batsman can do is push it back down the pitch to the bowler
overpitched and on the pads, Praveen Kumar hasn't got it right on this occasion, Alam hits with the angle and his placement is excellent, wide of the fielder at midwicket
fullish and outside the off, driven hard back past the bowler to long-off
short of a length and a but wide outside the off, played through the cover region. It's a no-ball as well and a free hit follows
Free hit: Fullish and outside the off, driven hard and in the air, but that's not a worry. Down to long-on for a couple
slower ball on the stumps, quite full as well, dug out to the on side
fullish and outside the off, driven hard but straight down to the fielder at long-off
slower ball on the stumps, Alam comes down the pitch and swats the ball towards cover for a single
short of a good length and outside the off, Alam comes down the pitch and carves the ball over the off side
this one is a touch too straight and on the pads, clipped away through the on side
fullish and on the pads, heaved to the on side for a single as there's a fielder on the ropes

Maximum! fullish and on the stumps, Alam gets hold of this one and strikes it cleanly back over the bowler's head. That's got enough on it to clear the ropes at long-on. Just what Pakistan needed at this juncture
slower ball ouside the off, agricultural heave through the on side from Alam, but it's just the single

Got him! slower ball outside the off stump, this one wobbles as it goes through, Misbah goes for a big hit, trying to clear the ropes. The ball goes off the toe of the bat and gets elevation but not distance. Pathan has to go for this one himself and he makes good ground but still has to dive to settle under the swirler.
full and on the stumps, Praveen Kumar striving for the yorker, it's dug out by Sohail Tanveer and a single is stolen to bring up the 300!
slower ball just outside the off, chipped inside out over the infield down towards long-off
very full and on the stumps, again aiming for the yorker, not much the batsman can do with that but knock the ball away to the leg side for a single
full and straight, dug out down the pitch for a single. Excellent last over so far from Praveen Kumar
slower ball, on the stumps, hit away down towards long-on for a single
down the pitch, dug out to the on side, the first run is taken quickly and the batsmen come back for a second. The throw from long-on is good but Praveen Kumar can't collect the ball.

inn2.comm: quick one just outside the off, played at and missed, through to the keeper
short of a length and outside the off, Gambhir slashes this over point
just short of a good length and outside the off stump, defended to the off side with an angled bat
overpitched and on the off, Gambhir leans into the line and punches just wide of mid-off for a quick single
fullish and quite quick, on the stumps, clipped to square-leg but there's a fielder to stop the run
short of a good length and outside the off stump, cut played and missed, through to the keeper
fullish and on the off stump, not much swing or seam movement, defended back down the pitch with a straight bat
just outside the off, coming in with the angle, left alone and that passes just outside the off stump
Shot! fullish and outside the off, Gambhir gets to the pitch of the ball and flashes it away through point. Gambhir is away
short of a good length and on the stumps, played at and missed, off the pads to the on side
fuller and on the stumps, this one comes in with the arm, Gambhir defends but a touch awkwardly
short of a length and outside the off, left well alone and wide called
once again back of a length and outside the off, left alone and Sohail Tanveer's over comes to an end
just short of a driving length and outside the off, punched off the back foot just wide of the man at point
short one banged in, it's pacy too, Gambhir fends at the ball and it flies off the shoulder of the bat just over the slips cordon. Lucky to get away with that
short one outside the off, pretty quick too, Tendulkar is hurried and beaten as the ball goes through to the keeper
another quick ball that beats the bat. Tendulkar tries to play a forcing shot through the off side off the back foot and is beaten. The ball goes pas the outside edge to the keeper
short of a good length and on the pads, clipped to the on side but not past the man at square-leg
short of a good length and outside the off, Tendulkar sways inside the line and cuts hard. The ball flies off the edge but does not carry to the slips fielder
overpitched and on the pads, that's not the place to ball, Gambhir just lays into that one flicking over the leg side. One bounce and over the ropes
short of a length but slipping down the leg side, flick played and missed, through to the keeper
short of a good length and on the off, Gambhir defends. The ball bounces back and just lobs over the stumps. That was close.
short of a length and outside the off, Gambhir fishes for the ball but misses, past the outside edge to the keeper

Got him! very full, on the off, coming in with the arm, Gambir falls over his stumps and is late on the ball, beaten by the pace and the movement. He misses. The ball crashes into pad and the Pakistanis go up in appeal as one. There's little doubt about that and Suresh Shastri gives the decision in the bowler's favour.
short of a length and just outside the off, Uthappa leaves it alone to the keeper
pushed through wider outside the off stump, decent pace as well from Sohail Tanveer, Uthappa watches it carefully and leaves the ball alone to the keeper
fullish and on the off, Tendulkar goes down on one knee and drives to cover
short of a good length and outside the off stump, Tendulkar stands tall and defends the ball to the leg side
short ball banged in, this one is slipping down leg though, good pace and bounce, through to the keeper
short of a length and outside the off stump, left well alone to the keeper
short of a length and outside the off, Tendulkar sees this very very early and is in position in a flash. He gets back and across and crashes this ball in front of point
yorker on the off, good comeback from the bowler, Tendulkar is not outdone and digs the ball out well

shot! that was the shot of the day, without a doubt. Just short of a length and outside the off. Tendulkar gets into position in a micro second and quick hands propel the ball in front of point, all along the ground. That is a shot of true class.
short of a length and wide outside the off, slanting further away, easily left alone and wide is called
much straighter this time, full too, defended back down the pitch
full once more and just outside the off, Uthappa opens the face of the bat and runs the ball to point
quick one just outside the off, Uthappa hangs the bat outside the off dangerously as the ball goes through to the keeper
fullish and outside the off, Uthappa opens the face of the bat and runs the ball down to third-man
just short of a good length and on the pads, Tendulkar walks across his stumps and works the ball to square-leg
full and on the stumps, defended back towards mid-on
full and straight, on the off, just a hint of away swing, defended back down the pitch to the bowler with the full face of the bat

Dropped! just short of a driving length and outside the off, Uthappa plays at it without moving his feet and the outside edge goes straight to Misbah-ul-Haq at slip. It's a sitter and Misbah floors it. Can you believe it? That's a real stroke of luck for Uthappa

Got him this time! Just short of a good length, outside the off, a virtually identical ball to the one Uthappa edged earlier. He plays an identical shot once more, giving Misbah a shot at redemption. If anything this flies quicker to the slip fielder and a bit to his right. Misbah clutches most gratefully on to this one and a disappointing end to Uthappa's stay at the crease
full and on the off, a definite shape of outswing here, Sehwag drives, off the leading edge back towards the off side
just short of a driving length and on the off stump, defended back down the pitch with a straight bat
short of a good length and outside the off, left alone to the keeper
full and outside the off, driven hard with an angled bat down to third-man
full and too far down the leg side for batsman to get bat to ball, wide called
fullish and on the pads, Sehwag works this one through the on side for a couple
overpitched, outside the off, a little too wide, Sehwag puts his foot down the pitch and slams that one in front of point. A bit risky but hit so well that no fielder has a chance
short of a good length and on the off, punched hard and the ball just wobbles away from the point fielder
Another one goes ... this one is on the pads and flicked away without any trouble whatsoever. Past square-leg and the ball races away to the fence
just short of a driving length and on the off, Sehwag waits on the ball and hits it towards mid-on
short of a length and outside the off, Sehwag cuts this hard but there's cover on the fence at third-man
short of a good length and on the off, defended back down the pitch just past the bowler to the fielder at mid-off
short of a length and outside the off stump, hit cleanly but not past the fielder at cover
just short of a length and on the middle and leg this time, clipped to the on side but to the fielder at mid-on
fullish and on the stumps, driven well back down the pitch, mid-on dives but can't quite get to it as it's timed well
short of a length but very wide outside the off, Tendulkar leans into the line of the ball, waits late and times the ball superbly through cover-point

The other side of pitch now! Too full and too straight, Tendulkar walks across the stumps and flicks this through square-leg. That is a crisp shot and not much the bowler can do when Tendulkar is on song like this
short of a length and outside the off stump, crashed in front of point but there is cover on the fence
fullish and on the pads, clipped away through midwicket for a single that gives the strike back to Sachin Tendulkar
down the pitch and squeezed backward of point. Tendulkar is in murderous mood over here. That simply races away to the fence

Gone! That is a really big wicket! Tendulkar goes after another bakk. Perhaps carried away by all the attacking strokes he has played so far. The angle takes the ball away from the middle of the bat and a thick outside edge flies straight to Misbah at gully. That's the wicket Pakistan desperately wanted and they have it.
Cut him in half! Short of a length and just outside the off, this one comes back in sharply and Sehwag inside edges. Sarfraz Ahmed dives and fields
Fullish and on the stumps, clipped away in front of the pad to the leg side side
fullish and on the off, Rohit Sharma defends back towards the off side with the full face of the bat
short of a length and a bit too much width, Sharma goes back and chops hard, just past the fielder at point
just short of a good length and outside the off, just a hint of swing, left well alone to the keeper
short of a good length and outside the off, slanting away from the right-handed batsman, played at and missed, through to the keeper
fullish, quite quick and outside the off, left alone to the keeper
Another gone! Sehwag flashes at this one and gets a thick edge straight to the keeper. Sarfraz Ahmed gets his first international dismissal and India are in some trouble here.
full and outside the off, Yuvraj jams the bat down and keeps that out
full and on the off stump, defended to the off side with an angled bat
just short of a good length and outside the off, left well alone to the keeper
fullish and on the off stump, defended back down the pitch
full and on the stumps, played back down the pitch to the bowler
short of a length and outside the off, Sharma waits on the ball and eases it down to third-man for a single
short of a length and on the stumps, Yuvraj takes his eyes off this one and fends the ball to the leg side
fullish and outside the off, this time Yuvraj watches the ball carefully and leaves it alone to the keeper
quick ball, just outside the off stump, left alone to the keeper. Pakistan's bowlers are in the middle of a probing spell here.
short of a driving length and outside the off, Sharma has a waft at this but misses, through to the keeper
fullish and outside the off, driven at, off a thick outside edge down towards point
full once more and on the stumps, this time Sharma is more conservative and defends towards the off side
fullish and outside the off, Tanvir comes round the stumps, flashed at and missed, through to the keeper
full and outside the off stump, driven wide of the fielder at point
just short of a good length and outside the off, Yuvraj is taking no chances, left alone to the keeper
Bang! short of a good length and outside the off, Rohit Sharma, even in dire straits, gets hold of this one and cracks it in front of point. That is very well hit
fullish and on the stumps, defended back down the pitch to the bowler
Cut in half! This one comes back in and Rohit Sharma's forcing shot it not to the line of the ball. That one comes in and goes past the inside edge
just short of a driving length and on the pads, defended away to the on side
fullish and on the pads, worked away to the on side, no chance of a run there
short of a length and outside the off stump, steered down to the fielder at third-man
short of a length and outside the off, left well alone to the keeper
short of a driving length and outside the off, Rohit Sharma can only open the face of the bat and run the ball down to third-man for a single
short of a length and on the off, Yuvraj pulls very awkwardly, hurried into the shot, the ball skews away to the off side off the body
full and outside the off, wide of the stumps, left well alone to the keeper
short of a length and outside the off, Sharma goes back and across and defends the ball down to point
full and on the off stump, Yuvraj drives tentatively, the ball goes off the pad back down the pitch
just short of a length and outside the off, defended towards mid-off off the back foot
full and outside the off, Yuvraj tries to ease the ball through cover. The ball moves in a touch and goes off a thick inside edge past the stumps and the keeper for a boundary to fine-leg
defended awkwardly back down the pitch towards mid-off
fullish and on the off, Sharma waits on the ball and defends really late

Shot! Completely against the run of play. Rohit Sharma advances down the pitch and gets to the ball. He then swings cleanly through the line, launching the ball over long-off. That is a sweet shot with the batsmen struggling over the last few overs
short of a length and on the pads, Yuvraj works the ball to the on side and picks up a single
fullish and outside the off stump, just a hint of swing in, left alone to the keeper
short ball banged in, the batsman ducks under this one
good pace, outside the off, just short of a length, Sharma plays an expansive shot outside the off but misses by some way as he's late on the ball
another one that's short of a length, on the stumps and pacy. Sharma comes down the pitch, gives himself a bit of room and tries to hit over the off side. He ends up missing completely.
attempted yorker on the stumps, this time Sharma waits on the ball and works it away through the on side
Ouch! short one banged in and Yuvraj does not see that at all. He's late on a pull shot and is clocked on the helmet. That looks a painful blow but he seems unperturbed
defended off the back foot to the off side
short of a good length and outside the off stump, played past point with an angled bat
good-length ball on the stumps, worked away through the on side for a single past the man at square-leg
short of a length and outside the off, chopped past the fielder at point
full and on the stumps, chipped towards mid-on
short of a length and outside the off, Sharma waits on the ball and places it down to third-man for a single
short of a good length and outside the off, Yuvraj waits on the ball and plays it to the on side for another single

back of a length and on the stumps, clipped away down to fine-leg, the batsmen run the first one hard, two Pakistani fielders converge on the ball and while the two are jostling to pick up the ball an extra run is conceded
short of a length and outside the off stump, this one just stops a bit before coming through. Sharma watches carefully and defends the ball back down the pitch
short ball banged in, pacy bouncer this, Sharma pulls but he's very late on the ball and it sails through to the keeper
slightly short and outside the off, Sharma cuts but can't beat the fielder at point
fullish and on the stumps, quite slow through the air, defended watchfully
eased down to midwicket
short of a length and on the off, no real turn for Alam, punched off the back foot down towards long-off
full and straight, driven just wide of mid-off
short of a good length and outside the off, hit hard off the back foot but not past the man at cover
eased to long-off
tossed up and outside the off, driven down towards long-off for a single to start the over
fullish and on the stumps, defended to the leg side
very full and on the stumps, on-side shot attempted, off the leading edge just past the bowler
a bit too wide and too short, played away through cover for a single
short of a length and outside the off, cut played and missed, through to the keeper
Sharma comes down the wicket and to the pitch of the ball, driving it wide of midwicket for a single
tossed up a bit more and on the off, driven at, off a thick inside edge down to the leg side
fullish and on the pads, flicked away quite easily but just a single
just short of a good length and outside the off, eased through cover
flat and on the pads, worked down towards long-on this time
short of a length and outside the off, chopped through point but there is cover on the fence
short of a good length and on the off, worked to mid-on to end the over
fullish and on the stumps, worked away down towards long-on for a single
down the leg side, sweep played and missed
very full and on the off, Yuvraj waits on the ball, opens the face of the bat and runs the ball to the off side
full and straight, worked to the leg side but no chance of a run
short of a good length and outside the off, played down to long-on for a single
short of a length and on the stumps, Sharma goes back and pulls towards on, it's uppish but falls well short of the fielder on the ropes at midwicket
on the pads and full, worked away through the on side
tossed up a touch more, on the stumps, Sharma comes down the pitch and flicks over the leg side
flatter and on the pads, worked to the leg side
full and on the stumps once more, again Yuvraj waits on the ball and eases the ball down to long-on
overpitched and on the pads, worked through square-leg for yet another easy single
tossed up, outside the off, Sharma sees this early and waltzes down the pitch, he times that sweetly over midwicket and finds the gap perfectly
fullish and on the stumps, wristily worked down to long-on
down the pitch comes Yuvraj this time, he takes the ball on the bounce and whips the ball through midwicket
fullish and on the stumps, Sharma waits on the ball and paddles the ball around the corner for a couple
short of a length and on the leg stump, Yuvraj waits on the ball and plays it through midwicket
full-toss outside the off, Sharma tries to hit that a bit too hard and in the end fails to take full toll, just a single to deep midwicket
short and on the stumps, Yuvraj comes down the pitch and swats the ball towards deep square-leg
short of a length and on the pads, worked towards midwicket for a single

Bang! slightly short of a length and outside the off, Sharma waits on this really well, gives himself a bit of room and plays an energetic cut just behind square for a boundary that brings up his half-century!
flat and on the pads, swept down towards deep backward square-leg
tossed up just a touch more and outside the off, Yuvraj comes down the pitch and defends that towards slip
This time Yuvraj jumps down the pitch and makes good contact, taking the ball on the full and striking it powerfully back down the ground. That's too straight for the long-off fielder
flat and on the pads, sweep played and missed
down the leg side, sweep played and missed, through to the keeper and wide called
full and outside the off stump, eased down to long-off for a single

Gone! Soft dismissal that. End of a good innings from Rohit Sharma. He comes down the pitch and lofts to long-on where Hameed takes a simple catch. That's the wicket Pakistan wanted, breaking a partnership that was building nicely.
short of a length and on the stumps, Dhoni is off the mark right away, thumping the ball down to long-on
short and down the leg side, swatted away through the on side
fullish and outside the off stump, eased down towards long-off for yet another single
down the leg side, clipped towards short fine-leg
pushed through fuller and on the off, Dhoni hits it hard to mid-off
paddle swept quite fine, typical Dhoni style, but not past the man at short fine-leg
very full and on the stumps, held back a touch, worked to the leg side with a straight bat
yet another easy single, no risks being taken, just ones milked down the ground
this time Dhoni pushes the ball away towards long-off for a single
back of a length and on the stumps, worked to the leg side for a single
again Dhoni just waits on the ball and slaps it past the bowler down towards long-off
tossed up and on the stumps, Yuvraj comes down the pitch and drives but straight back to the bowler
short ball outside the off, Dhoni goes back and hammers this with a horizontal bat back down to long-off
stroked down to long-on for a single that gives the strike back to Dhoni
flat and on the pads, worked to the on side with a close of the wrists
full-toss on the off, driven back hard, the bowler half stops and a single is taken anyway
short of a length, on the stumps, Dhoni pulls back towards the bowler who dives quickly and fields well
paddle swept in unorthodox fashion but just the single to short fine-leg
awkward dab back down the pitch to long-on for a single to kick the over off
slower one on the stumps, tossed up a fair bit, Yuvraj comes down the pitch but can only defend
tossed up a fair bit again, Yuvraj comes down the pitch but can only defend
this time Yuvraj gets hold of it after he comes down the pitch. Heaved over midwicket with some urgency and power
flatter and quicker in response from Malik. Yuvraj defends. Off the inside edge to the leg side
sweep shot played, off the top edge towards short fine-leg

Tossed up a bit more, slower through the air, Alam saw Yuvraj coming and held that back a touch. Yuvraj misses that by some margin and Sarfraz gathers and breaks the stumps. But replays show Yuvraj was got his bat back in just in time.
Maximum! Yuvraj celebrates living through that close stumping with a clean hit. That was a short ball and Yuvraj saw it really early, clattering the ball onto the roof of the stands at midwicket
fullish and outside the off, Dhoni tries to come down the pitch and hit back past the bowler but can't beat his man
fullish and outside the off stump, Dhoni swings and misses as the ball scoots along the ground to the keeper
back of a length and on the pads, worked past short fine-leg for a single
flatter and quicker, on the stumps, driven well but not past mid-on
full and floated in far outside the off, Yuvraj comes down the pitch but can't make clean contact with that full-toss
down the leg side, flick played and missed
thumped strongly, but straight into the ground and it's just a single to wide long-off
Yuvraj opens the face of the bat and runs this past the keeper for yet another single
short of a good length and outside the off, eased down towards long-off
down the leg side, from round the stumps, half-hearted flick played and missed, through to the keeper and wide called
short of a good length and outside the off, chopped down to third-man for a single
fullish and on the off, defended away to the on side for a single that brings up Yuvraj Singh's half-century
short of a length, pacy, outside the off, Dhoni leaves that well alone to the keeper
overpitched and on the pads, flick played and ball bobs away down towards square-leg, good running gets the batsmen a second run
fullish and on the stumps defended to mid-off
fullish and outside the off, pretty quick as well, Dhoni flays at that and misses, through to the keeper
and again! quick and outside the off, just a hint of away movement, Dhoni has a big flash at that and misses
short of a length and outside the off. That was only a fraction short and Dhoni creams it wide of midwicket. That was pulled in front of square with brutal power
short of a length and outside the off, chopped away in front of point

short one banged in, it's quick, Yuvraj goes for the pull and is a touch late. There's a spontaneous and loud appeal from behind the stumps and in front. The umpire, Suresh Shastri, thinks about it for a second and gives it in the bowler's favour. Yuvraj can't believe the call and stands rooted to his crease. This could be interesting. It looks like he's suggesting to the umpire that it came off shoulder. Either way, he has to walk off, and India's chances have taken a serious blow with the fall of that wicket
full and on the off, Pathan drives down to mid-off
short of a length and on the pads, worked to the on side
down the pitch comes Dhoni and has a swing. Inside edge and it beats the keeper
fullish and on the off, clubbed down to long-off for a single
short of a length, flat and on the off, driven down towards cover
flaoted in fuller and on the off, eased past mid-off for a single
fullish and outside the off, Pathan opens the face of the bat and runs the ball just behind point
short of a length and outside the off, flat-batted down towards long-off
tossed up a bit more and outside the off, slower through the air, punched wide of point

Gone! And that's a second telling blow. Dhoni comes down the pitch and tries to launch the ball over midwicket. The bat face is closed a bit early and the ball goes off the leading edge and heads straight up in the air. It's a real steepler, swirling about but Nazir settles under the catch and takes it. Big wicket and with that Pakistan should have this game all but wrapped up
full and on the off, driven with an angled bat wide of point
short of a length, fired in the pads, worked back down the pitch to the on side
full and on the stumps, Praveen Kumar drives down to long-on for a single
quicker and on the off, driven through point
another single taken, but singles won't do India's cause much good now
full and on the leg stump, defended back down the pitch to the bowler
full and straight, Praveen works it down to long-on for a single, then the throw comes in and an overthrow is stolen
flat and outside the off, big heave over midwicket attempted, that's a wild slog, no contact whatsoever
single pushed to the off side
flat and on the leg stump, defended with bat in front of pad
down the leg side, slightly slower, swept down to short fine-leg
short of a length and wide outside the off, sliced away down to the third-man fence
flat and quick, outside the off, driven to cover
flatter, quicker, short, defended back down the pitch
tossed up and outside the off, Praveen gives this a thump, misfielded at long-on and it's a boundary
fullish and on the off, defended away towards the off side with an angled bat
flat and outside the off, Praveen tries to his this over cover, thick outside edge over point
straight drive back past the bowler for a single
tossed up, outside the off, Praveen goes for a big hit - can't blame him in this situation - but only holes out to Sohail Tanveer at midwicket. Pakistan now inching closer to a strong consolation win
tossed up and on the stumps, a bit of turn, played through the vacant point region for a single
flatter and outside the off, chopped away in front of cover for a single
flatter and outside the off, chopped away in front of cover for a single once more
once again just squirted through the off side for a single
full and down the leg side, it's swept well, the fielder on the ropes dives but can't stop the ball from running away to the ropes
full and outside the off, driven away inside-out through cover
short of a good length and outside the off, left well alone to the keeper
chopped down to point but not past the fielder there
short of a length and on the off, defended down to the off side with soft hands
very full and on the off, punched down to long-off but just the single
short one banged in, Kartik defends the ball to his feet
short of a length and outside the off, slashed down to third-man for a single
Short one banged in, Kartik comes down the pitch, gives himself some room and carves the ball over point for a six! That's got the crowd onto its feet
very full and quite straight, Kartik gives room and tries to drive through the off side. He finds cover.
Full and outside the off, again Kartik swings. This time off a thick inside edge down to fine-leg for a chancy boundary
short of a good length and outside the off, Kartik opens the face of the bat and steers the ball down to third-man
short one banged in, Pathan ducks under it
good-length ball outside the off, driven past cover into the deep for a couple

And one stroke too many. Kartik comes down the wicket, the bowler adjusts his length. Kartik tries to improvise and scoop the ball over point. He just about finds the fielder and that's another Indian wicket gone.
short one banged in first up to Sreesanth, defended down to the on side with an angled bat
short ball banged in and Pathan goes for the pull. That's struck brilliantly well, perfectly in the gap and races away to the boundary just behind square on the leg side
attempted yorker, full and on the off, punched down the ground to long-off, just the single this time
full and down the leg side, flick played and missed, wide called
yorker on the off, a hint of inswing, dug out towards short cover
driven hard down to long-off for yet another single. The required rate is more than 12 now. Singles aren't going to help a whole lot
full and straight, good place to bowl to a tailender, defended back down the pitch
once again full and pretty straight, played down to point
short one banged in, ducked under
full and outside the off, Sreesanth drives and misses, through to the keeper
very full and swinging in a touch, driven to cover
full and just outside the off, defended towards cover
low full-toss on the stumps, swatted to the leg side but not past the infield
Finally Pathan goes for a big hit. The connection is clean and the ball sails over the ropes at midwicket. That is a good shot although it won't do anything to change the result of this game
driven to long-off for a single
fullish and outside the off, Sreesanth drives, gets the ball past cover
Sreesanth takes a single and gives the strike to Pathan
full and straight, Pathan tries to drive to on but only gets a leading edge down towards point
fullish and on the stumps, thick inside edge down towards fine-leg
Low full-toss outside the off and Pathan smacks this one through cover. That's a pleasing shot and Pathan is swelling his score even as this game winds down
short of a length and on the pads, played at and missed, off the pads to the off side
slogged away into the deep, the fielding isn't great and a couple of more runs the result
fullish and on the stumps, driven down to long-on for a single
short of a length and outside the off, Sreesanth cuts and misses, through to the keeper
down the pitch and slogged, that was heading straight for the stumps but a thick inside edge takes the ball past fine-leg and it's a flukey four to Sreesanth
short of a length and outside the off, Sreesanth has an adventurous swing and misses
full, quick, outside the off, Sreesanth advances, gives himself room, swings and misses ... yet again
short of a length and outside the off, Sreesanth advances and clubs the ball down towards long-off for a single to keep the strike
another slog, again not a clean connection, gets Pathan on strike
slower ball outside the off, swing and a miss
full and on the stumps, yorker fired in, well dug out
heaved over the leg side and we're almost done
quick yorker on the off stump. Pathan tries to give himself room and hit through the off. He misses and the off stump is pegged back. That is the end of the Indian innings and this match.
